function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Social isolation and distancing leading to psychological and physical health impacts for residents.","Impact":"Decreased quality of life and increased mental health issues.","Mitigation":"Promotion of social connection and access to nature within the home.","Technologies":"Design modifications to improve access to nature and variability in lighting levels.","People":"Residents of apartment housing.","Owner":"Architects, city planners, and building developers."},{"Description":"Lack of variability and variety in lighting levels based on new uses of the home.","Impact":"Disruption of circadian regulation and decreased wellbeing.","Mitigation":"Implementing flexible lighting solutions and environmental design that promotes comfort.","Technologies":"Smart lighting systems and circadian lighting solutions.","People":"Residents of apartment housing.","Owner":"Architects and building designers."},{"Description":"Inadequate environmental design that does not promote wellbeing and comfort.","Impact":"Negative impact on resident wellbeing and quality of life.","Mitigation":"Integration of restorative environmental design into apartment housing.","Technologies":"Restorative design principles and environmental design strategies.","People":"Residents of apartment housing.","Owner":"Architects and building developers."}]}
